debug.canvas.missing_uniform: Canvas unable to find uniform %s in shaders %s, %s. This is normal if the uniform isn't used in the shader.
error.canvas.fail_create_shader: Canvas unable to create shader %s with property index %d due to unexpected error: %s.
error.canvas.fail_create_shader_output: Canvas unable to create shader output folder %s due to unexpected error.
error.canvas.fail_clear_shader_output: Canvas unable to clear shader output folder %s due to unexpected error.
error.canvas.fail_create_any_shader: Canvas unable to create one or more shaders due to compilation errors. See canvas_shader_debug folder for details.
error.canvas.program_link_failure: Canvas unable to create linked shader due to unexpected error.
error.canvas.fail_create_lightmap:
Canvas unable to create HD lightmap(s) - out of space. 
Some blocks will not render with proper lighting. 
Reduce view distance or disable HD lightmaps. F3+A will temporarily clear this problem.
config.canvas.title: Настройки Canvas
config.canvas.help.fog_mode: Сделать туман более нежным или отключить его.
config.canvas.help.blend_fluid_colors: Более плавное смешивание цветов жидкостей (при переходе из одного биома в другой).;Незначительное влияние на производительность при загрузке чанков.
config.canvas.help.bloom: Включить эффект свечения вокруг источника света.;Влияние на производительность зависит от разрешения игры.
config.canvas.help.bloom_scale: Размер эффекта свечения вокруг источника света.
config.canvas.help.wavy_grass: Включить шейдеры для анимации травы, листвы и т.д.
config.canvas.help.handheld_light_radius: Максимальный радиус излучения света от светильника в руке.;0 - отключить излучение света.
config.canvas.help.light_smoothing: Сделать источник света менее крестообразным.;Загрузка чанков немного медленнее.;Общий уровень освещенности остается прежним.
config.canvas.help.hd_lightmaps: Плавное освещение.;Небольшое влияние на использование памяти,;загрузку чанков и частоту кадров.
config.canvas.help.more_lightmap: Зарезервировано больше памяти для карты освещения.;Может потребоваться для большой дальности прорисовки.;ТРЕБУЕТСЯ ПЕРЕЗАГРУЗКА
config.canvas.help.lightmap_noise: Незначительное изменение значения;освещения может предотвратить появление полос.;Незначительное влияние на производительность.
config.canvas.help.lightmap_delay_frames: Значение > 0 может дать немного;большую частоту кадров за счет потенциального;мерцания при изменении освещения.
config.canvas.help.semi_flat_lighting: Модели с плоским освещением имеют более плавное освещение;(но без рассеянного света).
config.canvas.help.batch_chunk_render: Draws multiple chunks with;same view transformation.;Much faster, but try without;if you see visual defects.
config.canvas.help.adjust_vanilla_geomet: Adjusts quads on some vanilla; models (like iron bars) to avoid;z-fighting with neighbor blocks.
config.canvas.help.clamp_exterior_vertic: Treats model geometry outside of;block boundaries as on;the block for lighting purposes.;Helps prevent bad lighting outcomes.
config.canvas.help.pad_translucent_forma: Pad vertex data in chunks with multiple;formats. Significantly increases frame rate;at cost of some wasted memory.
config.canvas.help.fix_luminous_block_sh: Prevent Glowstone and other blocks that emit;light from casting shade on nearby blocks.
config.canvas.help.terrain_setup_off_thr: Terrain setup done off the main render thread.;Increases FPS when moving.;May see blank chunks at edge on fast turns.
config.canvas.help.enable_vao: VAOs improve performance when supported.;Disable if causing problems.
config.canvas.help.cull_entity_render: Use more accurate logic to decide which entities to render.;Improves framerate in most scenes.
config.canvas.help.greedy_render_thread: When true, render thread does not yield to other threads every frame.;Vanilla behavior is false (yields).
config.canvas.help.force_jmx_loading: Use more efficient model loading.;Improves chunk rebuild speed and reduces memory use.
config.canvas.help.reduce_resolution_on_: Use half resolution on retina displays.;Greatly improves frame rate on Macs.;Requires restart.
config.canvas.help.vertex_control_mode: Reduce draw calls for terrain by controlling shaders; with vertex data. Faster on some hardware.
config.canvas.help.shader_debug: Output runtime per-material shader source.;For shader development debugging.
config.canvas.help.shader_debug_lightmap: Shows HD lightmap pixels;for debug purposes. Also looks cool.
config.canvas.help.concise_errors: Summarizes multiple errors and;warnings to single-line;entries in the log.
config.canvas.help.log_machine_info: Writes information useful for bug;reports to the game log;at startup.
config.canvas.help.log_gl_state_changes: Writes OpenGL state changes to log.;*VERY SPAMMY - KILLS FRAME RATE*;Used only for debugging.
config.canvas.help.debug_native_allocati: Used for debugging memory leaks. Will harm performance;and cause other errors. Requires restart.
config.canvas.help.safe_native_allocatio: Uses slower/safer memory allocation for GL buffers.;Use only if having problems. Requires restart.
config.canvas.help.debug_occlusion_raste: Output periodic snapshots of terrain occlusion raster.;Will have performance impact.
config.canvas.help.debug_occlusion_boxes: Render active occlusion boxes of targeted render region.;Will have performance impact and looks strange.
config.canvas.help.trace_occlusion_edge_: Log clipping or other non-critical failures detected;by terrain occluder. May spam the log.
config.canvas.help.buffer_debug: Enable rendering of internal buffers for debug purposes.;Off by default to prevent accidental activation.
config.canvas.help.lifecycle_debug: Output load/reload trace data to log;Will have performance impact.
config.canvas.help.log_missing_uniforms: Log uniforms not found in shaders. Sometimes useful for;shader debug. Will spam the log.
config.canvas.help.log_materials: Log render material states and vanilla RenderLayer mapping.;Useful for material debug and pack makers.;Will spam the log.
config.canvas.help.trace_occlusion_outco: Log various occlusion-related tests and status changes.;Highly verbose and WILL spam the log.
config.canvas.help.static_frustum_paddin: Padding at edges of screen to reduce how often terrain visibility;is computed. In degrees. Zero disables.
config.canvas.help.dynamic_frustum_paddi: Extra padding at edges of screen to reduce missing chunks when;view roates and Parallel Terrain Setup is on.;In degrees. Zero disables.
config.canvas.help.cull_particles: Culls particles that are not in view.;Should always be faster.
